DOC.brief_summary: To assess safety reactogenicity GSK Biologicals ' Haemophilus influenza type b vaccine co-administered without Chinese DTPw vaccine administer alone healthy infant ( 3 , 4 5 month age )
DOC.brief_title: Assess Safety & Reactogenicity GSK Biologicals ' Hib Vaccine Co-administered With Without Chinese DTPw Vaccine
DOC.detailed_description: All subject randomize two group . One group receive DTPw vaccine co-administered Hib another group receive DTPw vaccine alone . A specific follow-up solicit local general symptom vaccination . A specific follow-up unsolicited symptom vaccination . Recording serious adverse event report study period .
DOC.criteria: A male female infant , include , 11 17 week age time first vaccination . Planned administration vaccine foreseen study protocol period start 30 day administration first vaccine dose end 30 day last dose . Chronic administration immunosuppressant immunemodifying drug birth administration first dose study vaccine . Use investigational nonregistered product ( drug vaccine ) within 30 day precede first dose study vaccine , plan use study period .
